scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn run start-watch" "cd client && yarn start"
scripts.dev:local: concurrently "mongod >/dev/null 2>&1" "MONGODB_URI=mongodb://localhost/chinemachine yarn run start-watch" "cd client && yarn start"
scripts.github: git add . && git commit -m "backup" && git push -u origin master && cd client && git add . && git commit -m "backup" && git push -u origin master && cd ..
scripts.build:ui: cd client && npm run build  && cd .. && rm -rf server/build && cd client && cp  -r build ../server && cd ..
scripts.deploy: npm run bump && echo `date` > gitupdate && git add . && git commit -m deploy && git push heroku master --force
scripts.deploy:full: npm run bump && npm run build:ui && npm run deploy && npm run version
scripts.bump: cd client && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && cd .. && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version
